changes.balance: Potence now gets a minor STR buff for weapon attacks

changes.qol: Death Knight and Steal the sun commands now tells the user the amount of vitae needed for these actions if they lack enough.

changes.bugfix: Vampire Lord can ascend at their last Ritual of Ascension
Vampire Lord can acess their Tome Souls after their first ascension

changes.code_imp: Ritual of Ascension was renamed together with their stages and descriptions.
